text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here!
Yes its me Bob...
Join me for learning street with Bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host. Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
“A big big welcome to Mr.B. The stage is all yours”
“Thank you, Bob. It’s great to be here”
“Brilliant! Are you ready?”
“Absolutely. Do you want to see what sounds i can make?
“Yes,Yes”

Ba ba ba A bottle and baby 
and a busy bee
Can’t do without me me me

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM”

Ba ba ba bear and baboon 
Can’t boogie boogie Ba ba ba without B

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM”

Ba ba ba Balloons can’t float 
Neither can a Boat Ba ba ba Without me

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM

Ba ba ba Bells can’t ring 
Birds can’t sing Ba ba ba Without B

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM

A bus won’t move A ball won’t bounce
Ba Ba Ba Without me

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM

Take B out of Benchn Will sound like Ench
That’s no word It needs a B Ba ba ba

“BOOM BA BA BA  BOOM BOOM  BA BA BA BOOM BOOM BA BA BA BOOM
BOOM BOOM BOOM
Bob bob bob you need me
Ba ba ba Yes, I need B B

BA BA BA without B
The world will be quite empty
So, judges, are you ready to show us your scores.

“BRILLIANT” “A bright Star”
“B B B YOU’RE THE BEST”  
“BEAUTIFUL” “Brave
“Thank you judges! I am blessed!
Thank you Mr.B, and beautiful judges!
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters.
Till then Ba ba ba Bye bye !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
